bibl.title: Essays and Texts in Honor of J. David Thomas. (American Studies in Papyrology. 42.)
bibl.note: P. Thomas 1-31. - Pp. xiii-xxi: Bibliography of J. David Thomas. - I. Essays. [Nos 1-9.] - II. Texts [Nos 1-31, including 2 ostraca, 2 inscriptions and 3 mummy labels.] - III. Indices.
GAGOS Traianos and Roger S. BAGNALL (Edd.), Essays and Texts in Honor of J. David Thomas. (American Studies in Papyrology. 42.)
Oakville, Connecticut, American Society of Papyrologists, 2001, 4Â°, xxii-287 pp., 1 portrait et 24 pll. ISBN 0-9700591-3-2. $45.
